original_text: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.
korean_text: 수많은 재앙이 나를 둘러싸고 나의 죄악이 나를 덮치므로 우러러볼 수도 없으며 죄가 나의 머리털보다 많으므로 내가 낙심하였음이니이다

sentences.original_text: For innumerable evils have compassed me about:
sentences.korean_translation: 셀 수 없는 악들이 나를 에워쌌으니:

sentences.original_text: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me,
so that I am not able to look up;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 내가 고개를 들 수 없으며;

sentences.original_text: they are more than the hairs of mine head:
